key.name: lock-screensaver-on-audio
key.summary: Allow the screensaver to activate when playing audio
key.description: Allow the screensaver to activate when playing audio. Disable if you have monitor-powered speakers.

key.name: show-visualizations
key.summary: Show visual effects when no video is displayed
key.description: Show visual effects when playing an audio only file.

key.name: visualization-name
key.summary: Name of the visual effects plugin

key.name: brightness
key.summary: The brightness of the video

key.name: contrast
key.summary: The contrast of the video

key.name: hue
key.summary: The hue of the video

key.name: saturation
key.summary: The saturation of the video

key.name: auto-resize
key.summary: Resize the canvas automatically on file load

key.name: connection-speed
key.summary: Network connection speed
key.description: Approximate network connection speed, used to select quality on media over the network.

key.name: repeat
key.summary: Repeat mode

key.name: shuffle
key.summary: Shuffle mode

key.name: disable-deinterlacing
key.summary: Whether to disable deinterlacing for interlaced movies

key.name: debug
key.summary: Whether to enable debug for the playback engine

key.name: audio-output-type
key.summary: Type of audio output to use

key.name: visualization-quality
key.summary: Visualization quality setting
key.description: Quality setting for the audio visualization.

key.name: network-buffer-threshold
key.summary: Network buffering threshold
key.description: Amount of data to buffer for network streams before starting to display the stream (in seconds).

key.name: subtitle-font
key.summary: Subtitle font
key.description: Pango font description for subtitle rendering.

key.name: subtitle-encoding
key.summary: Subtitle encoding

key.name: open-uri
key.summary: Default location for the "Open..." dialogs
key.description: Default location for the "Open..." dialogs. Default is the current directory.

key.name: screenshot-save-uri
key.summary: Default location for the "Take Screenshot" dialogs
key.description: Default location for the "Take Screenshot" dialogs. Default is the Pictures directory.

key.name: disable-user-plugins
key.summary: Whether to disable the plugins in the user's home directory

key.name: disable-keyboard-shortcuts
key.summary: Whether to disable the keyboard shortcuts

key.name: autoload-subtitles
key.summary: Whether to autoload text subtitle files when a movie is loaded

key.name: autoload-chapters
key.summary: Whether to autoload external chapter files when a movie is loaded

key.name: remember-position
key.summary: Whether to remember the position of played audio/video files when pausing or closing them

key.name: active-plugins
key.summary: Active plugins list
key.description: A list of the names of the plugins which are currently active (loaded and running).
